By way of introduction to this torrent, here is a quote from iFanboy on Ben Grimm - "HeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s been called a monster, a degenerate and a louse, but heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll always be Aunt PetuniaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s favorite nephew and the bedrock to the Fantastic Four. Ben Grimm, aka the Thing, might be pigeon-holed by some as little more than the brutish muscle of the MarvelÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s super-science squad, but heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s much more than that. He was one of the first flawed heroes in comics, breaking the mold and the majesty of DCÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s heroes and forging the way for the unique brand of heroes Marvel would go on to develop. The Thing is one of the first heroes with problems, and being cursed with his craggy skin-type was only more of the same.

Hailing from New YorkÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Lower East Side, Ben Grimm came from the school of hard knocks and in his superhero identity heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s fought everything from street gangs to dictators to cosmic forces beyond comprehension. Heck, was even a pro wrestler. They say as you get older, every wrinkle tells a story; in the case of Ben Grimm, every crack in his stony exterior is an adventure waiting to be told over a cold beer."

To add to that, I think The Ever-Lovin' Blue Eyed Thing gets shortchanged quite a bit - he is the only member of the Fantastic Four that isn't related by blood or marriage, yet he has always been the loyalest friend and ally imaginable and is considered part of their family. Forever cursed with his rocky exterior and often longing to change back, still he has repeatedly given up chances to revert to human form for the greater good. He is in love with a woman who can't see him and that relationship has gone through many ups and downs. However, no matter what the odds are against him, he always fights to the bitter end, with his trademark catchphrase "IT'S CLOBBERIN' TIME!" ever at the ready. How can you not love this guy?

So this collection celebrates 45 years of great stories about Ben Grimm. I have previously uploaded both the first 4 and the last 5 years of Fantasic Four issues in digital form; I did not add material from those here. However, excepting that, I think it is fair to say that I tracked down nearly ever significant story about The Thing I could find, including all critical team-ups, solo adventures and key FF tales. Many limited series are also featured as well as full runs of the The Thing v1 and v2. Several legenda of the industry are featured as well, including Stan Lee, Jack Kirby, Barry Windsor-Smith and John Byrne. Here is the full contents list:

-Assorted Singles, GNs & One-Shots, which contains:
    Astonishing Tales - The Thing 01 (2009) (Digital Exclusive)
    Fantastic Four 051 (1966) (c2c) (Re-em-DCP-HD) ["This Man, This Monster", perhaps the greatest Thing story ever written and Stan Lee's personal favorite]
    Fantastic Four 350 (1991) ["The More Things Change...", fighting Dr. Doom!]
    Fantastic Four v3 056 [485] (2002) ["Remembrances of Things PastÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½", a great one-off tale by Karl Kesel]
    Fear Itself - The Worthy 08 (2011) (digital-Empire) [featuring The Thing]
    Hulk vs Thing (1999) (c2c) (ReprintsAreCool-DCP) [with some of their greatest battles]
    Marvel Fanfare v1 15 (Gird) [a tremendous story by Barry Windsor-Smith]
    MGC 29 - Incredible Hulk and The Thing - The Big Change (1987)
    Marvel Team-Up v2 010 (Namor The Sub-Mariner & The Thing) (1998)
    Stan Lee Meets The Thing 01 (2006)
    Startling Stories - The Thing - Last Line Of Defense (2003)
    Thing & She-Hulk - The Long Night 001 (2002) (noads) (ArtNet-DCP)
-Before the Fantastic Four - Ben Grimm and Logan 01-03 (2000)
-Marvel Icons - The Thing - Freakshow 01-04 (2002)
-Marvel Two-In-One (featuring The Thing) [issues 50, 51, 86, 100, Annual 07 and The Project Pegasus Saga HC - which reprints issues 53-58 + extras]
-Startling Stories - The Thing - Night Falls On Yancy Street 01-04 (2003)
-Strange Tales 124-134 (The Thing & Human Torch segments only) (1964-1965) [I have mixed this into a special one-volume .cbr with just Thing + Torch stories]
-Tales Of The Thing 01-03 (2005)
-The Incredible Hulk & The Thing - Hard Knocks 01-04 (Marvel Knights, 2004-2005)
-The Thing Is Big Ben 01-18 [UK Reprint Series] (1984) [This contains mostly reprints from Marvel Two-In-One including some material found elsewhere in the torrent, but also had additional side stories featuring Iron Man etc. intact]
-The Thing v1 01-36 (1983-1986) [which also has Fantastic Four 274 in the right spot for correct reading order, as issue "19b"]
-The Thing v2 01-08 (2005-2006, Digital, AnHeroGold-Empire)
-What If (featuring The Thing) [which contains What If  v1 037 - Beast and the Thing Continued To Mutate (1983), What If v2 109 - The Thing Had Refused To Leave Liddleville (1998), and What If Dr Doom Had Become The Thing (2005)]
-and last (and least, in this case): Marvel Super Heroes - Adventure Gamebook 05 - The Thing - One Thing After Another (1987) (TSR) [a pdf of an okay game]

Whew, yeah - that's a lot of clobbering. All scanners are listed in the titles of the folders or the files wherever applicable except for the one-volume Strange Tales edition I created, which is credited to BluePeter + Flatterman. any uncredited files are likely early scans by DCP or other such groups. MASSIVE thanks to all the groups out there, without whom none of these great comics would be available. PLEASE SEED this one - it's big, but worth it! As always, enjoy! :-)
